data.event: It has a Church of England parish church, Christ Church (built 1854) which serves a parish formally known as Shelton and Oxon.

event.title: was wound up after the 2011 season

data.event: The team played in the Shropshire Premier Cricket League until the league was wound up after the 2011 season.
In 2012 Shelton played in the Premier Division of the newly formed Shropshire County Cricket League but were relegated to Division 1 at the end of that season.

event.title: were relegated to Division 1 at the end of that season

data.event: In 2012 Shelton played in the Premier Division of the newly formed Shropshire County Cricket League but were relegated to Division 1 at the end of that season.
In 2015 Shelton finished second in Division 1, gaining promotion to the Premier Division and ending a spell of three years outside the top division.
